Shi Tao is now serving a 10 year prison sentence.
This is how committee chairman Democrat Tom Lantos of California ended his opening statement.
Shi Tao's mother is sitting in the first row behind you.

Yahoo is accused of divulging the e-mail address of Shi Tao, who had forwarded a memo from the Chinese government directing journalists not to cover the 15th anniversary of Tiananmen Square massacre.
